name: Petcore Europe
goal:
Petcore Europe is the European association and the voice of the entire PET value chain in Brussels. PET is an outstanding packaging material, and it is the largest plastic material recycled in Europe.

Petcore Europe represents all other associations and a significant number of companies involved in PET manufacture, PET packaging design and conversion, PET post-consumer recycling and other related activities. Detailed information is available on www.petcore-europe.org
interests: Consumer Affairs, Education, Enterprise, Environment, Food Safety, Internal Market, Public Health, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: All European initiatives, policies and legislation related to sustainability (e.g. eco-design, LCA and post-consumer waste management and recycling), the European Circular Economy and plastics strategy, and all other other related environmental, health and consumer safety matters.
